t: Inside the Downfall of Haven, the Amazon-JPMorgan-Berkshire Hathaway Venture - Business Insider
s: January 11, 2021 - Unlike most upstarts, Haven had brand recognition and, at least in theory, a large employee population to experiment on — but couldn't overcome a poor organizational structure, he said. "My general gist is everyone should be applauded for trying to take big swings in healthcare," Krishnan said. Combining three large companies with vastly different employee groups across the country set the venture up to be difficult, he said — so did Amazon...
